title: Select All Customers
description: Select all columns from the Customers table.

title: Select First Names
description: Select only the first_name column from Customers.

title: Filter by Country
description: Select all customers from the USA.

title: Order by Age
description: Select all customers and order them by age.
solution: SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY age

title: Count Customers
description: Find the total number of customers.

title: Find Older Customers
description: Select names of customers older than 25.
solution: SELECT first_name FROM Customers WHERE age > 25

title: Find Specific Item
description: Select all orders where item is 'Keyboard'.

title: High Amount Orders
description: Select orders with amount greater than 1000.

title: Distinct Countries
description: List all unique countries from Customers table.

title: UK Customers
description: Select first_name of customers from UK.
solution: SELECT first_name FROM Customers WHERE country = 'UK'

title: Substring Example
description: Select the first 3 characters of customer_name from the customers table.

title: Get Current Time
description: Select the current time using current_time() from the customers table.

title: Get Data Status
description: Use the getdata() function to show the reading status from the customers table.
